PhymlStreamGobbler, RaxMLStreamGobbler
public abstract class StreamGobbler
extends java.lang.Thread

Allows the asynchronous logging of an input stream.

Instantiates a new StreamGobbler

Parameters:
isr - the input stream reader to evaluate
